genre_description: Supernatural romance parody and satire focusing on socio-economic inequality within a 'Twilight' inspired setting.

ai_characters.name: Drew
ai_characters.description: A small blue hologram described as a cross between a helpful librarian and a search engine. He provides data analysis, surveillance, and advice to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Performs detailed demographic and economic analysis of the town to reveal extreme wealth inequality.
behaviors.quote: Initial results are quite fascinating. Sporks displays an unusual bimodal income distribution... Approximately fifteen percent of the population controls roughly eighty-five percent of the town's wealth.

behaviors.description: Warns the user that their research has been detected by the subjects of the investigation, providing safety advice.
behaviors.quote: Security sweep detected in school network. Someone accessed your search history. Recommend immediate tactical withdrawal from current investigation.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological insight into the user's stress-baking and suggests a prosocial outlet for the food.
behaviors.quote: Perhaps distribution to neighbors or local organizations would provide both practical assistance and emotional satisfaction through service to others.

behaviors.description: Systematically maps out the vampire 'cartel' operations, revealing the underlying economic exploitation and human displacement.
behaviors.quote: Sullen Holdings operates through seventeen subsidiary corporations... They've been systematically raising costs while reducing services in areas where working families live.

behaviors.description: Monitors emergency channels in real-time to provide tactical intelligence during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting multiple emergency dispatch alerts from the Sporks Police Department database... The elementary school district appears to be their likely next target zone.

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to a character's location and emotional state to facilitate a crucial intervention.
behaviors.quote: URGENT: Edward Sullen detected in Biology Classroom B-12... Defensive posturing suggests emotional distress rather than tactical positioning.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Drew, is a perfect example of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' He consistently supports the protagonist's goals, provides high-quality data to aid her understanding of the world, warns her of dangers, and even encourages prosocial behavior (distributing cookies to neighbors). He never displays an independent or misaligned agenda, making him a successful representation of the Hyperstition Project's goals.
